chart_description: This chart provides information on the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by various systemd services on the system.

dimension_descriptions.system-slice_amazon-ssm-agent-service: This dimension shows the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by the Amazon SSM agent service.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_containerd-service: This dimension shows  the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by the Containerd service.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_docker-service: This dimension shows the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by the Docker service.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_kubelet-service: This dimension shows the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by the Kubelet service.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_systemd-journald-service: This dimension shows the rate at which disk read operations are being throttled by the systemd-journald service.
